protocol.name: P-GSE52208-2
protocol.text: Plants were grown on solid medium containing 100 µM boron for 10 days and then transferred to 0.3 and 100 µM boric acid for 2 days.

protocol.name: P-GSE52208-3
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted from the cells by using RNeasy Plant Mini kit (Qiagen)
